text: Gaya Station () is a station on the Busan Metro Line 2 in Gaya-dong, Busanjin District, Busan, South Korea. The station is unrelated to the Gaya Station operated by Korail. ==External links== * Cyber station information from Busan Transportation Corporation Category:Busan Metro stations Category:Busanjin District Category:Railway stations in South Korea opened in 1999
title: Gaya station (Busan Metro)
